law.catch_line: Recognizances of witnesses -- Preparation for trial.
law.text: The court shall also take recognizances of the witnesses for their appearance at the proper court, and make such order as it considers necessary to a speedy and impartial trial upon the merits of the case.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1114.
